citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 pm on April 24,
2023. Contact was made at the facility; however, the licensee was not able to be available and on property for an
inspection for several hours.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 pm on April 24, 
2023. Contact was made at the facility; however, the licensee was not able to be available and on property for an 
inspection for several hours. 
 
 
 
End Section
